text: Roger Harry Daltrey CBE (born 1 March 1944) is an English musician best known as the singer of English rock band The Who. He has also had a solo career. He has released eight solo albums. He has also worked as an actor in the theatre, on television and in many movies. As a member of The Who, Daltrey was inducted into both the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in Cleveland and the UK Music Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:English rock singers Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Singers from London Category:Progressive rock singers
title: Roger Daltrey
